name: Tree Top Signal
description:
Tree Top Signal is about the story of Noky, a cute old-stylish phone, who lost his way home. Collect items and reach the top of the biggest tree to get satellite signal, but the task is not easy at all, so you better watch out!

Can you make it? Or will you lose ?
Do you accept the challenge?!?

How to play

Press A to move LeftPress D to move Right
Press SPACEBAR to Jump

Creators

Boy Best - 3D Artist / Environment Artist

Sten Bosma - Programmer

Luke R - Programmer

Nia Andersson - Programmer

Sofia Lennhager - 2D Artist

Angelo Migliaresi - Level Design

Music - Boy Best
